trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_SEQ_00<tab>The eccentric researcher has an eccentric proposition.

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_000<tab>Pardon me, but you wouldn't happen to be <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you? The very same <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> who saved Solution Nine?

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_001<tab>Ahahaha, I knew it! You, my heroic friend, are in luck, for I'm granting you permission to test your might against my indomitable dummies. Usually they're reserved for military research, but I'm willing to make an exception for one of <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> talents!
TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_002<tab>Hmm? Nothing to say? Ah, of course. You've been struck dumb by my overwhelming generosity.
TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_003<tab>Not to worry, for I will ease you in with a thorough explanation. Once you've returned to your senses, come meet me in the outskirts.
TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_010<tab>Ahahaha, there you are! I trust you've recovered from the shock of my initial proposal? Good, good─now let me explain what this is all about.

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_100_010<tab>I am a researcher for Oblivion, namely in the field of electrope engineering. During Zoraal Ja's reign, I survived within the ranks of his army by helping to research and develop protective materials.

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_011<tab>One of my many projects was these indomitable dummies, and as their name implies, their durability is second to none. They were used to measure the offensive potential of an entire arsenal of weapons to great effect.

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_012<tab>But now Zoraal Ja is no more, and peace has returned to our home. A preferable outcome, of course, but it does mean that my masterworks have been left to rust...
TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_013<tab>And that is an affront to science I cannot forgive! Peace may demand we set down our weapons, but the march of progress must go on!
TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_014<tab>And so I grant you, who seems to possess might equal to an entire squadron of hardened troops, access to the Spire of Trial.

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_015<tab>Of course, I am more than willing to make adjustments as befits the magnitude of your power. As a woman of science, I can think of no greater honor than to have you testing the limits of my creations.

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_ENGINEERA05005_000_016<tab>You've given me purpose anew, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll be here testing and improving the dummies when able, so you're welcome to stop by any time, even if only to gaze upon my indomitable beauties!

TEXT_KINGYR103_05005_SYSTEM05005_000_020<tab>You now have access to the Spire of Trial─an expansion of Stone, Sky, Sea. This training ground can be accessed by speaking with the eccentric researcher in Heritage Found.
